rows.label: qev030609_MSG0005
rows.name:
*cough* Nemard is making horn-ring of betrothal.
Who will be his mate?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030609_MSG0004
rows.name:
I hope it is woman who can support him.
He is useless boy. *cough cough*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030609_MSG0002
rows.name:
Never thought I would live this long. Long enough to
see soft-bellied Nemard find mate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030609_MSG0003
rows.name:
Hoh hoh! And such fine drink! I am ready.
Death can come. *cough* I will go happy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030609_MSG1001
rows.name: *cough cough* I hear you fought Galba. *cough*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030609_MSG1002
rows.name:
When I was chieftain, he and I cut swathes through
Cavern Clan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030609_MSG1003
rows.name:
Hoh hoh. But now we are old. Frail.
Time to leave things to Nemard and Bazis.
Time to move on from life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030609_MSG1004
rows.name:
I am fortunate to enjoy such fine time before end.
*cough* I have no regrets.[ST:wait ]
